about.title: What's the teclab

location.first: teclab is a place for students to meet after school at the

about.description:
Students have the possibilities to make connections with other
students, work on projects, eat something, make homework or
listen to presentations.

features.title: Compete in Robotics
features.subtitle: Olympics
features.description: Test your skills in competition where robots solve world changing tasks

wro.paragraph: Learn the basic of programming with the easy software of Lego Mindstorms and compete in a world-wide Olympiad

ai.paragraph: Support your dream with AI and test your programming skills in a competition from the federal state Baden-Württemberg

vex.paragraph: VEX Robotics is also a world-wide competition like the WRO with huge robots that push obstacles over a 2m game board controlled by the player
